Dentacoin: Intelligent Solutions
Transforming the Future of Dentistry

Dentacoin
"What used to work will keep me successful forever"
is the death sentence of over 32000 dental practices, closing their doors each year. That's where Dentacoin steps in.
About us

Take Your Dental Practice to the Next Level!

Dentacoin is the Bitcoin of Dentistry. But if offers much more than just another payment option. Dentacoin is the first Blockchain* concept for the Global Dentistry, which provides highly efficient, secure and automated software solutions to support each dental practitioner into building a successful patient-driven dental practice. Make your practice successful, regardless of location, capacity, experience!

* Trust us on this: Using Blockchain solutions has never been easier. Blockchain is just a new technology like the internet was 20 years ako. It stands behind Bitcoin and other similar digital currencies, including Dentacoin. Because it serves as a bridge between Blockchain and dentistry, Dentacoin allows you to easily benefit from the technology advances with no deep technical knowledge needed.

How

Simple and Easy to implement!

Implementing Dentacoin at your practice does not require any specific competence. Also, it will not waste any extra minute of your valuable time! Our advisory team will gladly help you learn everything about implementing Dentacoin and guide you through the process.






Schedule a call


or Download your FREE information Brochure!
